title: Index I Specification
description: Content and formatting specification for the output of the data dictionary parser tool

VARIABLE_ACC.description: The unique identifier for a variable

DATASET_ACC.description: The unique identifier for a data set

STUDY_ACC.description: The unique identifier for a study

DATASET_DESC.description: Researcher-supplied description of the data set

UNITS.description: Unit of measure in which the variable is reported

ENCODED_VALUES.description: A list of the codes and their meaning for categorical variable values
